reviews.title: Absolutely outstanding
reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding from start to finish. The Vernon Building Society operates at a different altitude to the rest of the market. From first contact through to completion, delivery was disciplined, decisive, and refreshingly competent. No noise, no overpromising, no drift. Decision-making was sharp, communication was proactive, and every commitment landed exactly as scoped. The team clearly understands both risk and real-world delivery, which results in pragmatic outcomes rather than process theatre. People are empowered, accountable, and know their brief. The operating model is slick without being soulless. Queries are resolved once, properly, by individuals who take ownership instead of deflecting responsibility. Timelines are respected, documentation is clear, and execution is predictable. That is rare. In a sector saturated with mediocrity, The Vernon Building Society sets the benchmark. If you value competence, transparency, and outcomes over rhetoric, this is best-in-class performance.

reviews.title: Pleased to have chosen Vernon for our new BTL venture
reviews.text: Very good start to the process with Jack Mottershead very responsive and supportive. Pretty smooth all through with questions answered quickly by the support team too. Negatives: some of the requirements seemed biased towards a retail mortgage rather than a commercial BTL loan, so to me were strange, as if one-size-fits-all on paperwork. I'm disappointed that you can't choose to set the monthly mortgage payment to a higher 'static' amount and pay off principal on a drip-feed basis: appreciate you can make £1k minimum, but i prefer to accelerate repayment by starting low and eating into loan principal monthly so the repayment amount starts to increase by pennies but on a compound basis.. Lower rate would have been nice: had a lower rate option (even allowing for fees over a fixed term basis) but decided to stay with Vernon given customer support in the early stages and kept fingers crossed that nothing went wrong laterly... luckily it didn't.

reviews.title: Remortgage - Fast & Friendly Service
reviews.text: This was the first time I'd used Vernon Build Society for a mortgage product. Previously I've used online brokers or gone direct to big lenders. The mortgage I chose was one of the 'Best Buy' recommendations on MoneySavingExpert hence me contact Vernon Building Society.
